statements: UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_history SET receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003';
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transaction_history SET sender_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', receiver_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' WHERE amount > 1000;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.00 WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE peer_details SET peer_address = '123 Main St' WHERE peer_name = 'Alice';

UPDATE peer SET peer_name = 'Alice', balance = 2000.00 WHERE peer_id = 10;

UPDATE peer_accounts SET balance = balance - 100.25 WHERE account_id IN (SELECT account_id FROM peer_details WHERE name = 'Alice' AND email = 'alice@example.com');
